snippet.title: Evercade - The Oliver Twins Collection | First Look Gameplay
snippet.description:
James from ItsMuchMore takes a look at The Oliver Twin's Collection for the Evecade  

Update the firmware on your Evercade - https://www.evercade.co.uk/support/

Why not also buy Xeno Crisis & Tanglewood Evercade Dual Game Cart here - https://amzn.to/2TDi1q3

If you like Evercade as much as us, why not be a part of the Evercade Fan Group on Facebook here - https://www.facebook.com/groups/2537048386509890/

All the latest info, tips, user manuals and more for the Evercade retro handheld console can be found on this amazing website - http://evercade.info/

Here is the equipment used in the video :
- Amazon Basics 3m HDMI Mini - https://amzn.to/2UXhH6L
- KabelDirekt 1m Mini HDMI - https://amzn.to/2AMJwrE
- Hauppauge HD PVR 2 Gaming Edition - https://amzn.to/311wwsA
- Evercade Handheld - https://amzn.to/2Cu9y3r

If you would like to record and stream the Evercade then check out our video here - https://youtu.be/VvH3GnSDuXo

Check out our unboxing and first look at the Evercade here - https://youtu.be/bcT5VDvdGOg

#evercade #MrEvercade #evercadegames

Intro created by Chris from Retro48k - https://www.youtube.com/user/DigitalDiamond/
Intro music by _def - https://freesound.org/people/_def/sounds/118879/

Thanks for watching

------------------------------------

We can also be found on other social media platforms, why not like, follow and subscribe to all of those too:

🤜Check out our website - http://www.ItsMuchMore.com
🤜Twitter - https://twitter.com/ItsMuchMore
🤜Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ItsMuchMore
🤜Instagram - https://instagram.com/itsmuchmore/
🤜Twitch - http://www.twitch.tv/itsmuchmore
